name: Stuntz! [A Scrolling Platformer]
description: |NOTE: BE SURE TO CLICK THE GAME SCREEN BEFORE PLAYING TO ENSURE THE AUDIO PLAYS|Controls: WASD or ARROW KEYS to move|Navigate through the city night as you overcome a series of obstacles!| Avoid the red spikes and try not to fall into the abyss!|All levels are possible! Good Luck!| This is a small project I made on Scratch that I wanted to share here on itch.io for fun and to test out the site! I hope you enjoy!| Music: Alone by Marshmellow|
